ygData.msgSnippet: It is better at least on the necromancer side. Verant changed the way it works so I think it may work like LifeTap now, not sure though. ... From:

It is better at least on the necromancer side. Verant changed the way it
works so I think it may work like LifeTap now, not sure though.
